item.description:
Mountain Biking!

The Basics: Back Country Excursions is located approximately 45 minutes outside of Portland in the beautiful town of Parsonsfield, Maine. This is an excellent opportunity for an instructional mountain biking session and at the end there's a guided ride on appropriate trails for novices. The whole activity would last about 2- 3 hour time commitment. There is absolutely no cost outside of the $1 meetup fee and Back Country Excursions will provide a good mountain bike and helmet. Back Country Excursions is able to offer us this wonderful opportunity because they will be training new certified instructors during the excursions.

 

Date & Time: Sunday, May 20th from 9:15am until approximately 12:30pm.

 

Details: This meetup would be $1.00 - the cost of the meetup fee. You will receive free mountain biking instucton and guided riding on appropriate trails for beginners . As noted above, a good mountain bike and helmet will be provided to you. This is a no pressure, ideal situation for folks that have an interest but want to be introduced gently into the sport.


Requirements: You need to be in fairly good aerobic shape and like an adventure. Also you need to be very comfortable riding a bike. If you have not been on a bike for a couple of years it is not recommended to start again with mountain biking.

 

I'm interested! Now what?

This part is REQUIRED: RSVP Yes, then contact Cliff via email bcountry@psouth.net or by phone 207-625-8189 so he can officially fit you into a session and answer any questions you may have. He will also provide you detailed directions to the meetup and facility.  At that time folks could enroll several people at once- friends or other meetup members  so not everyone needs to contact me. We'll also ask you for your phone number when you RSVP, so we have a way to contact you to follow-up if anything changes.
item.how_to_find_us: Please note: Starting at 1:45pm. If you get lost, you may call Back Country Excursions at 207-625-8189.
item.name: Back Country Excursions Mountain Biking
